## End of registration 

Thank you for registering for the **1st Annual Immcantation Users Group Virtual Meeting**. Your registration has been received. 

The meeting will be held on January 29th, 2020, from 12:00pm to 3:00pm (EST). You will receive a reminder email along with connection details for how to join the meeting one week before the event. If you submitted an abstract and it is selected for presentation, you will receive an email notification by December 20th, 2019.

Further details can be found at [our website](http://kleinstein.bitbucket.io/a-name-to-be-decided/). If you have any questions, please contact us at [immcantation@googlegroups.com](mailto:immcantation@googlegroups.com). 

Best,  
The Immcantation Team
